feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -35.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -35.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -38.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
